meta.description: Determine the optimal production plan to maximize the profit for the factory producing three types of products with specific equipment constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the factory.

sets.name: EQUIPMENT_A
sets.description: Types of equipment for processing step A.

sets.name: EQUIPMENT_B
sets.description: Types of equipment for processing step B.

params.name: processing_time
params.description: Processing time required for each product on each type of A equipment.

params.name: processing_time_b
params.description: Processing time required for each product on each type of B equipment.

params.name: equipment_available_time
params.description: Available time for each type of A equipment.

params.name: equipment_available_time_b
params.description: Available time for each type of B equipment.

params.name: equipment_cost
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for each type of A equipment.

params.name: equipment_cost_b
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for each type of B equipment.

params.name: raw_material_cost
params.description: Raw material cost per unit for each product.

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Selling price per unit for each product.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((unit_price[p] - raw_material_cost[p]) * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS) - sum(equipment_cost[a] for a in EQUIPMENT_A) - sum(equipment_cost_b[b] for b in EQUIPMENT_B)
objective.description: Maximize the profit by considering the selling price, raw material cost, and equipment cost.

constraints.name: A1_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time['A1'][p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time['A1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: A2_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time['A2'][p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time['A2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: B1_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B1'][p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: B2_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B2'][p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: B3_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_b['B3'][p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_b['B3'][p] is not None)
